attributes.action: STOP MEDDLING IN THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS OF ZIMBABWE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Further, to respect that states sovereign goverment and leadership. He should stop agitating for 'colonial intervention' and leave the O.A.U to resolve the conflict.

To concern himself only in making sure that there are effective measures in place to stop unskilled, uneducated and unwanted  people entering the United Kingdom. These somtimes being of British decent.
